metadata.title: CVE-2018-6516 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: On Windows only, with a specifically crafted configuration file an attackercould get Puppet PE client tools (aka pe-client-tools) 16.4.x prior to16.4.6, 17.3.x prior to 17.3.6, and 18.1.x prior to 18.1.2 to loadarbitrary code with privilege escalation.

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
